languages.text: "Наши миссионеры случайно обнаружили схрон, в котором Аспис прятала своих пленных родичей. И я избрал тебя, Инцендия, чтобы восстановить честь династии Чорда. Я заставил тебя претерпеть страсти, провел по мукам, содрал с тебя кожу тщеславия и самодовольства, заставил уповать на Него и уверовать в Него. Я сделал тебя такой, какая ты есть сейчас".

"Our missionaries accidentally discovered the hideout in which Aspyce had hidden her captive relatives. And I chose you, Incendia, to be the restorer of House Chorda's honour. I caused you agony. I took you down a path of suffering. I flayed away your skin of vanity and complacency. I made you believe in Him and put your hopes in Him. I made you what you are now."
languages.original_text: "Наши миссионеры случайно обнаружили схрон, в котором Аспис прятала своих пленных родичей. И я избрал тебя, Инцендия, чтобы восстановить честь династии Чорда. Я заставил тебя претерпеть страсти, провел по мукам, содрал с тебя кожу тщеславия и самодовольства, заставил уповать на Него и уверовать в Него. Я сделал тебя такой, какая ты есть сейчас".

languages.text: “我们的传教士无意中发现了一个藏身处，阿斯拜丝把她所有的亲族都囚禁在冷冻舱里。于是我选择了你，因森蒂娅。我选择你来恢复库尔达家族的荣耀。我给你带来了无数痛苦，我带着你走上了痛苦之路。我剥下了你虚荣与自满的外皮，我让你相信神皇，让你把希望寄托在祂身上。我造就了现在的你。”
languages.original_text: "Our missionaries accidentally discovered the hideout in which Aspyce had hidden her captive relatives. And I chose you, Incendia, to be the restorer of House Chorda's honour. I caused you agony. I took you down a path of suffering. I flayed away your skin of vanity and complacency. I made you believe in Him and put your hopes in Him. I made you what you are now."

traits.locale_text: “我们的传教士无意中发现了一个藏身处，阿斯拜丝把她所有的亲族都囚禁在冷冻舱里。于是我选择了你，因森蒂娅。我选择你来恢复库尔达家族的荣耀。我给你带来了无数痛苦，我带着你走上了痛苦之路。我剥下了你虚荣与自满的外皮，我让你相信神皇，让你把希望寄托在祂身上。我造就了现在的你。”

languages.text: 「聖務団は、アスパイスが捕虜にした親族を閉じ込めている隠れ家を、うっかり見つけてしまった。そして私は、チョーダ一族の名誉を回復させる者としてお前を選んだのだ、インセンディア。私はお前に苦痛を与えた。苦しみの道に引きずり込んだ。お前の虚栄と自己満足の皮を剥いだ。主を信じさせ、主に希望を持たせた。お前がこうなってしまったのは、私の責任だ」
languages.original_text: "Our missionaries accidentally discovered the hideout in which Aspyce had hidden her captive relatives. And I chose you, Incendia, to be the restorer of House Chorda's honour. I caused you agony. I took you down a path of suffering. I flayed away your skin of vanity and complacency. I made you believe in Him and put your hopes in Him. I made you what you are now."

traits.locale_text: 「聖務団は、アスパイスが捕虜にした親族を閉じ込めている隠れ家を、うっかり見つけてしまった。そして私は、チョーダ一族の名誉を回復させる者としてお前を選んだのだ、インセンディア。私はお前に苦痛を与えた。苦しみの道に引きずり込んだ。お前の虚栄と自己満足の皮を剥いだ。主を信じさせ、主に希望を持たせた。お前がこうなってしまったのは、私の責任だ」

languages.text: «Nuestros misioneros descubrieron por accidente el escondite en el que Aspyce había ocultado a sus familiares. La elegí a usted, Incendia, para ser la restauradora del honor de la casa Chorda. Le causé agonía. La llevé por un camino de sufrimiento. La despojé de vanidad y complacencia. Le hice creer y poner sus esperanzas en Él. Es lo que es por mí».
languages.original_text: "Our missionaries accidentally discovered the hideout in which Aspyce had hidden her captive relatives. And I chose you, Incendia, to be the restorer of House Chorda's honour. I caused you agony. I took you down a path of suffering. I flayed away your skin of vanity and complacency. I made you believe in Him and put your hopes in Him. I made you what you are now."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestros misioneros descubrieron por accidente un escondite en el que Aspyce mantenía cautivos a sus familiares. La elegí a usted, Incendia, para ser la restauradora del honor de la casa Chorda. Le causé agonía. La llevé por un camino de sufrimiento. La despojé de vanidad y complacencia. Le hice creer y poner sus esperanzas en Él. Es lo que es por mí».

languages.text: "Unsere Missionare haben zufällig das Versteck entdeckt, in dem Aspyce ihre Verwandten gefangen gehalten hat. Und ich habe Euch, Incendia, auserwählt, die Ehre von Haus Chorda wiederherzustellen. Ich habe Euch Qualen bereitet. Ich habe Euch auf eine Pfad des Leids geführt. Ich habe Euch die Haut der Eitelkeit und Selbstgefälligkeit abgezogen. Ich habe Euch an ihn glauben lassen und Eure Hoffnung in ihn setzen lassen. Ich habe Euch zu dem gemacht, was Ihr nun seid."
languages.original_text: "Our missionaries accidentally discovered the hideout in which Aspyce had hidden her captive relatives. And I chose you, Incendia, to be the restorer of House Chorda's honour. I caused you agony. I took you down a path of suffering. I flayed away your skin of vanity and complacency. I made you believe in Him and put your hopes in Him. I made you what you are now."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Missionare haben zufällig ein Versteck entdeckt, in dem Aspyce ihre Verwandten gefangen gehalten hat. Und ich habe Euch, Incendia, auserwählt, die Ehre von Haus Chorda wiederherzustellen. Ich habe Euch Qualen bereitet. Ich habe Euch auf eine Pfad des Leids geführt. Ich habe Euch die Haut der Eitelkeit und Selbstgefälligkeit abgezogen. Ich habe Euch an ihn glauben lassen und Eure Hoffnung in ihn setzen lassen. Ich habe Euch zu dem gemacht, was Ihr nun seid."

languages.text: « Nos missionnaires ont découvert par hasard une cachette dans laquelle Aspyce avait enfermé ses proches, et c'est vous, Incendia, que j'ai choisie pour restaurer l'honneur de la maison Chorda. Je vous ai mise au supplice, en vous faisant suivre une voie pavée de souffrance. Je vous ai flagellée jusqu'à ce que tombe votre peau de vanité et de suffisance, puis je vous ai forcée à croire en l'Empereur et à placer tous vos espoirs en Lui. J'ai fait de vous ce que vous êtes aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "Our missionaries accidentally discovered the hideout in which Aspyce had hidden her captive relatives. And I chose you, Incendia, to be the restorer of House Chorda's honour. I caused you agony. I took you down a path of suffering. I flayed away your skin of vanity and complacency. I made you believe in Him and put your hopes in Him. I made you what you are now."

traits.locale_text: « Nos missionnaires ont découvert par hasard une cachette dans laquelle Aspyce avait enfermé ses proches, et c'est vous, Incendia, que j'ai choisie pour restaurer l'honneur de la maison Chorda. Je vous ai mise au supplice, en vous faisant suivre une voie pavée de souffrance. Je vous ai flagellée jusqu'à ce que tombe votre peau de vanité et de suffisance, puis je vous ai forcée à croire en l'Empereur et à placer tous vos espoirs en Lui. J'ai fait de vous ce que vous êtes aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: "Misyonerlerimiz tesadüfen, Aspyce'nin tutsak akrabalarını gizlediği sığınağı keşfetti. Ve Chorda Hanesi'nin onurunu geri kazandıracak kişi olarak seni seçtim İncendia. Çektiğin ızdırabın sebebi benim. Seni acıyla dolu bir yola soktum. İçindeki gösteriş ve kayıtsızlığı budadım. Seni O'na inanır, umutlarını O'na bağlar hâle getirdim. Seni şu anki hâline getirdim."
languages.original_text: "Our missionaries accidentally discovered the hideout in which Aspyce had hidden her captive relatives. And I chose you, Incendia, to be the restorer of House Chorda's honour. I caused you agony. I took you down a path of suffering. I flayed away your skin of vanity and complacency. I made you believe in Him and put your hopes in Him. I made you what you are now."

traits.locale_text: "Misyonerlerimiz tesadüfen, Aspyce'nin tutsak akrabalarını gizlediği sığınağı keşfetti. Ve Chorda Hanesi'nin onurunu geri kazandıracak kişi olarak seni seçtim İncendia. Çektiğin ızdırabın sebebi benim. Seni acıyla dolu bir yola soktum. İçindeki gösteriş ve kayıtsızlığı budadım. Seni O'na inanır, umutlarını O'na bağlar hâle getirdim. Seni şu anki hâline getirdim."
